p: Exploration of the coffin and the autopsy of the unidentified two-year old mummy (NASD24) was completed as part of a larger study, conducted between 1984 and 1987, of mummies from the sacristy of the Basilica of Saint Domenico Maggiore in Naples, Italy. Autopsies were performed for all mummies by paleopathologists wearing sterile surgical coats, sterile latex gloves, sterile masks, headdresses and overshoes. Details of this initial investigation have been reported previously [ 40].
